En un carro donde prepara churros, Jesus trabaja hace aproximadamente 10 años para generar ingresos con los cuales pueda ofrecer a su familia mejores oportunidades económicas y mejor calidad de vida. Dado el poco capital con el que contaba en el momento de iniciar el negocio Jesus trabaja con un carro alquilado, lo que le representa una desventaja en su negocio para poder obtener mayores utilidades, es por esto que Jesus busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra del carro donde prepara las comidas, el cual es alquilado, y poder así tener mayores utilidades.

Jesus espera que de esta manera pueda tener mayores utilidades de su negocio y su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Además, Jesus sueña con tener un gran negocio y con aprovisionar con un motor su carro, para que de esta manera pueda trabajar más gastando menos tiempo en el transporte de su carro.
texts.en:
Jesús is a person who has always been noted for being very hardworking and for providing very good customer service in his business.  He’s married and has a one year old son.

Jesús is a person whose family provides him with much emotional support to be able to withstand the long work days his business demands.  Jesús has been working for about ten years with a cart making "churros" [deep-fried dough sprinkled with sugar and cinnamon] to generate income with which to offer his family better economic opportunities and better quality of life.  

Because of the little capital he had when he started the business, Jesús has been working with a leased food cart which is a disadvantage for his business to earn higher profits which is why Jesús is looking for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy the cart he uses to prepare his food which he currently leases thus obtaining higher profits.

Jesús hopes this way to have higher business profits and that his family will be able to enjoy a better quality of life.  Also, Jesús dreams with having a great business and to install a motor in his cart so that he can work better wasting less time transporting his cart.

loans.use: to buy the food cart that he currently leases.

loans.name: Rose Monday

texts.en:
Rose lives in Yei. She sells fish and has been in business for three years. She is 26 years old, married and has three children; two of them are still in school. 

Rose heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Blidmer

texts.es: Blidmer, de 24 años, es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de su mamá Guida, su papá Gregorio y sus 2 hermanos Melvin y Talía, a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Ancalayo. Como hijo mayor, trabaja para ayudar a sus padres y hermanos, “mis padres son mayores, necesitan de mi apoyo”, afirma. Por eso hace algún tiempo, con la ayuda de Ángel, su socio; alquiló un taller de fabricación de ladrillos, en los que realiza 30 mil millares al mes, vendiendo estos por pedidos establecidos al mes, ya que cuenta con clientes fijos, a los que constantemente les ofrece lo mejor que él sabe hacer. Además de poseer gracias a su esfuerzo, 2 toros los que alimenta con mucha dedicación, cuenta que el mismo siembra alfalfa, para alimentarlos. De esa manera soportan las largas jornadas de trabajo en el arado de la tierra. Ahora desea incursionar en la crianza de vacas, pues hay demanda en la compra de leche fresca, para ello dará el primer paso en la compra de una de calidad. Este es el primer crédito con MFP y se siente feliz, pues encontró la ayuda que tanto necesitaba, para emprender sus objetivos. Además es responsable en todas sus labores, por ello promete ser puntual en los pagos. Blidmer de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una vaca, que cuesta un promedio de 2 mil nuevos soles. Ya tiene ahorrado un poco, con lo que completará la totalidad del costo.
texts.en: Blidmer, 24, is a responsible man.  He lives with his mother, Guida, his father, Gregorio, and his two siblings, Melvin and Talia, whom he cares for in his own home, located in the town of Ancalayo.  As the oldest son, he works to help his parents and siblings.  "My parents are older, and they need my support," he states.  To do this, he has for some time now, with the help of Angel, his partner, rented a brick-making workshop where he makes 30,000 bricks a month, selling these on the basis of monthly orders to his regular customers.  He is always offering his customers the best products that he knows how to make.  In addition to this, thanks to his efforts, he has 2 bulls that he feeds with a lot of dedication.  He says that he also cultivates alfalfa, which he uses to feed them.  Thus, he must bear long days of work plowing the land.  Now he wants to start up a business raising cows, because there is a demand for fresh milk.  To do this, he will take the first step by purchasing a quality cow.  This is his first loan with MFP, and he feels happy, because he found the help that he needed so much to realize his plans.  In addition, he is responsible in all of his work, and so he promises to be on time with his payments.  Once Blidmer receives your support, he will invest the money requested in the purchase of a cow, which costs an average of 2,000 Peruvian soles.  He has already saved up a little money, and so with this loan he will gather together enough money to make this purchase.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en:
Oretha is 42 years old and lives in the Airport area. She is married with seven children between 18 and 25 years old; only three of them live at home and attend school. Her husband works with Firestone. 

For the past 15 years, she has been involved in local soap making. She was taught by her mother how to make the local soap. She is requesting a loan to purchase caustic, oil and other items for her business. In the future, she wants to live a standard life.

loans.use: to purchase caustic, oil and other items for her soap-making business.

loans.name: Betty Karaba

texts.en:
Betty lives in Yei. She sells fish and has been in business for five years. She is 25 years old and married with no children.

Betty heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Rosa Elena Castellanos Gonzales

texts.es:
Rosa Elena  tiene 41 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 5 hijos de 16, 14, 12, 10 y 6 años de edad, todos están estudiando, vive con ellos en la Lopez, Choloma Cortes.
Doña Rosa el negocio que le genera ingresos es un Taller de costura. Lo estableció en su casa hace10 años, las prendas que ella hace son Cameras (ropa de cama), camisas y cortinas. Dice que cuenta con bastante clientela y por lo tanto sus prendas se venden favorablemente. Este negocio le ha ayudado a solventar los gastos del hogar. Dice que trabajar en lo propio le has dado la ventaja de estar al mismo tiempo cuidando a  sus hijos. El tiempo que le dedica a su negocio es de 10.00 pm a 5.00 pm.
El préstamo que solicito es de 10,000 lempiras para comprar materia prima como Telas, broches, botones, hilos etc. Para elaborar sus prendas de ropa. y poder seguir trabajando y ofreciendo a sus clientes calidad de producto.
Su meta es que sus hijos sigan estudiando y que su hijo que tiene 14 años poderle establecer una barbería.
texts.en:
Rosa Elena, 41, is a single mother of five children who are 16, 14, 12, 10, and 6 years old; all attend school.  She lives with them in La Lopez in Choloma, Cortes.  Rosa’s income producing business is a sewing workshop.  She set it up at home ten years ago.  The types of things she makes are: bed sets, shirts and curtains.  She says that she finds quite a few customers so her items sell well.  This business has helped her cover household expenses.  She says that having her own business has also made it possible for her to spend more time watching over her children.  She works from 10am until 5pm.

She’s asking for a 10000 lempira loan to buy raw materials like fabric, clasps, buttons, thread, etc. to make her articles of clothing and to be able to stay in business offering her customers quality products.

Her goal is that her children continue with their studies and to set up a barber shop for her 14 year old son.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Rosalina Alzate Franco

texts.es:
Rosalina es una persona que ha tenido que superar grandes adversidades, sin embargo, sus ganas de trabajar y salir adelante le han permitido progresar junto con sus 10 hijos. Rosalina anteriormente se encontraba casada, sin embargo, el padre de sus hijos la abandonó desde hace un tiempo y ella quedó a cargo de sus 10 hijos como una madre soltera cabeza de familia. A pesar de estas dificultades, sumadas a las dificultades económicas, ha tenido la fortaleza para superar las adversidades y seguir ofreciendo a su familia una buena calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso. Rosalina, para poder generar los ingresos que requiere su familia, ofrece alimentos como morcilla, mazamorra, empanadas, entre otros que prepara en su casa. Gracias a esto, Rosalina ha podido generar los ingresos que requiere en su hogar para poder sacar sus hijos adelante. Con el ánimo de mejorar las condiciones donde trabaja y ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes, Rosalina busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de un fogón de gas e insumos para preparar sus comidas.

Rosalina espera que de esta manera su negocio siga creciendo y algún día pueda tener la oportunidad de abrir un local donde ofrezca sus alimentos. Además, Rosalina sueña con que sus hijos salgan adelante y tengan la oportunidad de tener una mejor estabilidad económica y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosalina is a person who has had to overcome a lot of adversity.  However, her desire to work and get ahead has allowed her to make progress along with her 10 children.  Rosalina was previously married.  However, the father of her children abandoned her some time ago, and she was left to care for their 10 children as a single mother and head of household.  In spite of these difficulties, which have been compounded by financial difficulties, she has had the strength to overcome adversity and continue to offer her family a good quality of life and better opportunities for progress.  In order to generate the income that her family needs, Rosalina has a business selling food such as sausages, pudding, empanadas, and other dishes that she prepares in her house.  Thanks to this work, Rosalina has been able to generate the income that she needs for her household and provide for her children.  In an effort to improve the conditions where she work, and to offer better products to her customers, Rosalina is seeking a loan that will allow her to purchase a gas stove and supplies to make her dishes.

Rosalina hopes that in this way her business will continue to grow, so that someday she will be able to have the opportunity to open a restaurant where she could offer her food.  In addition, Rosalina dreams that her children will be able to get ahead and have the opportunity to have better economic stability and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove and supplies to make her meals

loans.name: Celso

texts.es: Celso, de 63 años, vive en compañía de 2 de sus 4 hijos: Stefany y Jonatan. Alos que quiere mucho y cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de El Tambo. Enviudó hace 4 años, desde entonces tiene que luchar por sus hijos, cuidar de ellos y representar el papel de madre. Es un poco difícil comenta, pero en todo este tiempo logró ganarse la confianza de ellos, quienes lo aprecian mucho. Desde hace 20 años, abrió un taller en su propia casa, donde realiza todo tipo de máquinas panificadoras, como batidoras, cortadoras, hornos para hacer panes y demás. En todo este logró obtener buenos clientes, además de perfeccionar su capacidad en la construcción, tiene muchas máquinas todas ellas le ayudan en su trabajo. Los meses de diciembre tiene mucho trabajo, es en ese mes donde contrata personal, ya que no solo se dedica a la fabricación de las máquinas, también realiza mantenimiento, reparación y perfeccionamiento. Ahora desea mejorar su negocio y poder contratar a un profesional que pueda sustituirlo, ya que no tiene las mismas fuerzas de antes. Pero como es un hombre responsable, comenta que siempre supervisará el negocio que tanto lo apasiona. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Celso de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de materiales, planchas de aluminio, pernos y demás insumos para la construcción de sus máquinas panificadoras.
texts.en:
Celso, 63, lives with two of his four children: Stefany and Jonatan, who he loves very much and cares for in his own house located in El Tambo.  He became a widower four years ago and since then has had to strive for his children, care for them and also play the role of mother.  It is a bit difficult, he comments, but he’s managed to win over their trust and they care for him very much.  

Twenty years ago he opened a workshop at home where she makes all sorts of bakery equipment like mixers, slicers, bread baking ovens and others.  He managed to obtain good customers as well as to perfect his manufacturing capacity.  He has a lot of machinery that helps him do his work.

During the month of December he has a lot of work and it’s when he hires staff because he doesn’t only manufacture the machinery but also provides maintenance, repair and upgrading services.  He wants to improve his business and to hire a professional to take his place because he does not have the strength he used to.  But since he’s a responsible man, he states that he will always supervise the business that he’s so passionate about.

This is the first MFP loan and he feels very satisfied to be able to develop his activities with normalcy because he has support from all of you.  He promises to make his installment payments punctually because he’s always been a hardworking, reputable person.

If Celso were to receive your support, he will use the requested money to buy sheets of aluminum, bolts and other supplies needed to build his bread baking machines.

loans.use: to buy sheets of aluminum  and bolts.

loans.name: Yorladi Omaira Henao

texts.es:
Yorladi tiene su negocio de venta de prendas de vestir desde hace aproximadamente 2 años, cuando inició su negocio con la necesidad de ofrecer a su hija de 3 años todo lo que necesitaba. Yorladi se encuentra casada y tiene una niña de 3 años que ha hecho que su vida sea mucho más feliz. Debido a que los ingresos que genera su esposo no son suficientes para cubrir todos los gastos de su hogar, Yorladi inició un negocio de venta de prendas de vestir a través de catálogos, y gracias a esto ha podido generar ingresos con los cuales pueda atender todas las necesidades de su hogar. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrece y la buena calidad de sus productos, Yorladi ha tenido la oportunidad de captar un gran número de clientes que le garantizan muy buenas ventas mensuales, a tal punto en que a menudo se ve en la obligación de rechazar algunos pedidos de sus clientes por la gran cantidad que solicitan. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta condición y seguir saliendo adelante, Yorladi busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de prendas de vestir que le han encargado sus clientes.

Yorladi espera que de esta manera su negocio siga creciendo y pueda seguir saliendo adelante junto con su esposo y su hija. Yorladi tiene el sueño de tener un gran almacén donde pueda generar empleo y desde el cual pueda generar una estabilidad económica para su familia y mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
Yoraldi has had her clothing sales business for approximately two years now; she started it because she needed to provide her three year old daughter everything she needed.  Yoraldi is married and has a three year old daughter who has caused her life to be much happier.  

Because the income her husband generates is insufficient to cover all household expenses, Yoraldi started selling clothes via catalogue and thanks to this has been able to generate income to cover all her home’s needs.  Thanks to the good customer service and quality products she offers, Yoraldi has had the opportunity to win over a large number of customers who guarantee good monthly sales to such an extend that often she has to refuse some customer orders because of the large amounts she’s requested.  Hoping to improve this condition and continue to get ahead, Yoraldi is looking for a loan that will give her the opportunity to buy clothing her customers have placed orders for.

Yoraldi hopes her business will continue growing this way and she will be able to continue moving forward with her husband and daughter.  Yoraldi dreams with having a large store where she can generate employment and from which she can generate economic stability and greater opportunities for progress for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes to fill pending customer orders.

loans.name: Assiba

texts.fr: Assiba est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Elle est revendeuse de sacs de maïs, du pain et autres. Dans le but de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un micro crédit à Finadev afin de maximiser son profit et de contribuer aux dépenses du foyer.
texts.en: Assiba is married and a mother of two. She sells sacks of corn, bread, and other items. With the goal of growing her business, she's asking for a microloan from Finadev to maximize her profits and contribute to household expenses.

loans.use: to buy six sacks of corn and two 25L containers of oil.

loans.name: Frederman Daniel

texts.es:
Frederman es un joven originario de Granada, soltero, realizo sus estudios hasta la primaria. Se dedica al servicio de transporte de coche desde hace 10 años en el departamento de Granada anteriormente trabajaba como obrero, de ese trabajo fue ahorrando para mas adelante comprar un caballo después con el apoyo de instituciones financieras  a la edad de 17 años logro comprar un coche ahora saca adelante su trabajo sin apoyo de nadie haciendo recorridos solo en su comunidad principalmente se estaciona en el parque central de Granada ya que llegan  turistas de países nacionales y extranjeros. El  no cuenta con otros ingresos pero se siente muy satisfecho de su negocio ya que es algo que hace dentro de su misma comunidad donde puede estar cerca de su familia , tiene la esperanza de que los turistas sigan enamorándose del servicio de coches que ofrece la comunidad para asi poder obtener mas ingresos.
 Frederman realiza el préstamo para comprar los accesorios necesarios para el mantenimiento del  coche  con el objetivo de brindar un mejor servicio y tener una mejor presentación ya que seria más atractivo para los turistas y para poder mejorar su patrimonio.
texts.en:
Fredman is a young man from Granada.  He’s single and completed elementary school.  He’s been providing horse-drawn carriage rides for ten years in the department of Granada.  He used to work as a day laborer and started saving from that job in order to buy a horse.  Then, with support from financial institutions at the age of 17 was able to buy his carriage and now does his work without any help from anyone providing tours mainly in his community.  He parks at the Granada main park since national and foreign tourists come there.  He has no other source of income but he feels very satisfied with his business since it’s something he can do in his own community and be near his family.  He hopes that tourists will continue to be enchanted with the carriage rides he offers in the community in order to earn more income that way.

Fredman is taking out the loan to buy accessories needed to provide maintenance for the carriage aiming at providing better service and to have a better appearance so that it will be more attractive to tourists and improve his assets.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and to service his horse-drawn carriage.

loans.name: Nynozka Isabel

texts.es: Nynozka de 41 años de edad es originaria de san Carlos-Rio San Juan, actualmente vive en Granada, tiene 2  hijos de 11 y 8 años de edad los cuales están a su cargo. Ella  se dedica al comercio tiene el negocio de pulpería desde hace 2 años y medio. Inicio su actividad con la venta de productos básicos variados a la edad de 36 años, ella estuvo un tiempo trabajando en el extranjero  donde con mucho trabajo recogió dinero que invirtió en el negocio luego fue creciendo con el apoyo de créditos adquiridos por instituciones financieras, cuentan con otros ingresos ya que reciben remesas departe de los familiares del esposo. En el negocio la apoya su esposo debido a que ella también se encarga del trabajo domiciliar, se siente muy satisfecha con su negocio ya que no tiene competencia en su comunidad más bien a invertido en productos que son de alta demanda en el lugar,  es un negocio que va en vía de crecimiento. Solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de bebidas variadas granos básicos como arroz, leche, pan, frijoles, etc. Como planes futuros tiene la esperanza de comprar la casa donde esta alquilando, se considera  una persona con espíritu de superación y de metas.
texts.en:
Nynozka, 41, is from San Carlos-Río San Juan.  She currently lives in Granada and has two children who are 11 and 8 years old and in her care.  She is a merchant.  She’s had a grocery store for two and a half years.  She started selling assorted basic staple items at the age of 36.  She worked abroad for a time and with much effort was able to save up some money that she invested in the business.  Later, it gradually grew with help from loans acquired from financial institutions.  They also can rely on other income because her husband’s relatives send them stipends.  Her husband helps her with the business since she also does the household chores. She feels very satisfied with her store because she has no competition in her community.  She’s invested in items that are in high demand there and it’s a business that’s on the road to growth.

She’s asking for the loan to buy assorted soft-drinks, basic grains like rice, milk, bread, beans, etc.  Her future plans include buying the house she live in which she’s currently renting.  She considers herself to be a person with goals and a spirit for self-improvement.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Ena

texts.es:
Ena, de 42 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora, además de  decidida. Es conviviente con Francisco quien es albañil y padre de sus 5 hijos Jelsin del 18, Elen de 13, Jimy de 11, Sandy de 9, Brenda de 7  años de edad.  Vive en compañía de su pareja y sus  hijos a los que adora y son el motivo de querer  progresar. Habitan en su casa propia, que logró construir junto con su pareja. La actividad que realiza Ena  es la venta de abarrotes en general, para lo cual cuenta con una pequeña bodega, que acondiciona en su propia casa, viendo las necesidades de sus vecinos y el poder generarse un ingreso económico, la motivo a abrir su bodega. Lleva funcionando hace más de 2  años, tiempo con el cual logró hacerse conocida entre sus vecinos y ganarse así una regular clientela, contando con la ayuda de sus hijos en la atención al público.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la ganancias que le deja, pues mantiene una regular clientela que siempre le compran sus productos. Le gusta su actividad  poder estar  en casa  para poder ver y atender a sus hijos, el tiempo que le deja libre la dedica al cuidado de su hogar, también le gusta el ingreso económico que le genera, con el cual poder apoyar a su pareja con los gastos de su hogar. 
Por tanto, tiene planes de  hacer incrementar el stock de sus productos y diversificar su variedad para así tener más acogida entre sus clientes. Este seria el préstamo numero 6 con la institución MFP, se siente contenta con la oportunidad brindada de poder contar con un capital de trabajo, desea poder seguir contando con éste apoyo, para lo cual se compromete a ser puntual en sus  pagos. Además de estar a gusto con su banco comunal por el apoyo que se brindan mutuamente.
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, comprará  más variedad de abarrotes como conservas, leches en polvo, aceites, arroz, etc. Buscando precios bajos por sus compras en volumen, de esa podrá ser más competitivo en relación a precios.
texts.en:
Ena, 42, is an enterprising and very hardworking woman, as well as determined.  She lives with Francisco, a bricklayer and the father of their five children, Jelsin 18, Elen, 13, Jimy, 11, Sandy, 9, and Brenda, 7.  She lives with her partner and her children, whom she adores and who are the reason for wanting to get ahead.  They live in their own house, which she managed to build together with her partner.

Ena's work is selling general groceries, for which she has a small store that she sets up in her own house.  Seeing the needs of her neighbors and the ability to generate an income for herself motivated her to open her store.  She has been in business for more than two years, during which time she has made herself known among her neighbors and earned a regular clientele.  She has the help of her children in serving the public.

She considers her business to be very worthwhile for the profits it gives her, because she maintains a regular clientele that always buys products from her.  She likes her job: being able to be at home to see and take care of her children, and the free time it gives her to dedicate to caring for the household.  She also likes the income it generates for her, with which she can help her partner with the household expenses.  Consequently she has plans to increase her stock and diversify her variety to have greater acceptance among her customers.

This will be her sixth loan with MFP.  She is happy about the opportunity to be able to have working capital.  She wants to be able to continue having this support, so she promises to be punctual in making her payments.  In addition, she is comfortable with her communal bank because of the support they give each other.

With the requested amount of 1000 nuevos soles (PEN) she will buy a greater variety of groceries, such as canned food, powdered milk, oil, rice, etc.  Looking for low prices for her bulk purchases, she will be able to be more competitive with regard to prices.

loans.use: to buy canned food, powdered milk, oil, and rice.

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es: Teófilo de 34 años, vive en compañía de su esposa Rosa y sus hijos a los que cuida mucho. Ambos salen adelante, en la localidad de Colcabamba, donde tienen su casa propia. Teófilo es un hombre responsable, todas las mañanas se dirige a su trabajo en la gobernación de su localidad, donde le pagan un dinero mensual. Pero como él es un hombre sabio, no solo tiene está actividad. También, desde muy pequeño comenzó a cuidar de sus animales, tiene ovejas, cabras, caballos, los cuales comercializa en las constantes ferias que se desarrollan en todo el país, se siente desarrollado, sobre todo porque recibe el apoyo de su esposa, a quien quiere mucho. Además cada tiempo libre que tiene los aprovecha al máximo como albañil, trabajando en la construcción civil, y burde pellejo de ganados, es uno de las pocas personas que desarrolla este talento en su zona. Con todas estás actividades, se siente ocupado y feliz, pues podrá brindarle lo que más necesita su familia. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Teófilo de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de animales para mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Teófilo, 34, lives with his wife, Rosa, and their children who he takes care of.   They both get ahead in Colcabamba where they own their house.  Teófilo is a responsible man.  Every morning he heads out to work at his job with city hall where he earns a monthly salary.  But, because he’s a wise man, he doesn’t just have that job.  

Also, since he was little he’s been caring for animals; he has sheep, goats and horses that he sells in the livestock markets that take place constantly throughout the country.  He feels much fulfilled especially because he has his wife’s support who he loves very much.  Also, whenever he has free time he works as a bricklayer in civil construction and he also tans animal pelts; he’s one of the few people in his location that does this type of work.  With all these activities he feels occupied and happy because he will be able to provide what his family most needs.

This is the fifth MFP loan and he feels very satisfied to be able to carry out his activities with normalcy because he has all of your support.  He promises to make all his installment payments punctually because he’s always been a hardworking, honorable man.  

If Teófilo were to receive your support he will use the requested money to buy animals to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy animals.

loans.name: Agnes Ukwale

texts.en: Agnes, a 34-year-old married mother of three, owns a boutique in Loitoktok. In business for 12 years, she earns a monthly income of 20,000 shillings. This will be Agnes' first loan with KADET LTD, which she will use to purchase more clothes to sell. In the future, she hopes to improve her business and live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing to sell.

loans.name: Guiselle Johana

texts.es: Guiselle, 31 años de edad, madre de un pequeño hijo de 9 meses, es comerciante vende joyas de plata que su padre elabora. Ella ha trabajado desde muy joven creció viendo el oficio de su padre que es joyero. Un día decidió poner su propio negocio y fue entonces cuando hablo con su padre para que le ayudara a elaborarle joyas baratas y así ella vender más favorable .De esta manera empezó, buscando clientes en la ciudad en el mercado a domicilio tocando puertas en busca de personas que desearan usar sus prendas. Lleva  3 años con este negocio con el cual ayuda a los gastos de su hogar. Ahora quiere vender oro también es por ello que requiere el préstamo para invertir en compra de joyas de plata y oro. Pues desea salir a vender fuera de la ciudad y necesita variedad de producto para vender. Uno de sus planes futuro es ir mejorando su vivienda poco a poco para darle un techo digno a su hijo.
texts.en:
Guiselle, 31, is the mother of a little nine month old son.  She’s a merchant; she sells silver jewelry her father makes.  She’s worked since she was very young noting her father’s occupation which is being a jeweler.  One day she decided to start her own business and that’s when she talked to her father so that he’d help her making inexpensive jewelry that she could more easily sell.   This is how she started looking for customers going house to house knocking on doors looking for people who would like to wear her items.  She’s been in business three years and it helps her meet household expenses.  

Now she’d like to sell gold too which is why she needs the loan to buy silver and goal jewelry.  She intends to go sell beyond the city and needs a variety of product to sell.  One of her future plans is to make some home improvements to gradually provide a proper home for her son.

loans.use: to buy silver and gold jewelry.

loans.name: Migdalia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Migdalia, 45 años de edad, de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de comida tales como pollo, carne, enchilada, ha hecho esta actividad durante 18 años. Donde cada tarde saca su mesita de plástico, sus manteles limpios su sillas y su estufa y comienza a colocar sus platillos a la espera de la llegada  de sus clientes. Poco a poco fue haciendo más conocido su puesto de comida, se volvió muy solicitado el sabor y olor de su comida cacera fue gustando mucho a las personas que a diario la visitan. 
Ella usara el préstamo para comprar pollo, carne, plátanos que son parte de la materia que utiliza para elaborar sus deliciosos platillos. Una de sus metas próximas es comprar una cocina, mejorar la visibilidad y comodidad de su puesto de comida para darle una mejor atención a sus clientes .Es una mujer que le gusta el progreso , ser dinámica y activa en su negocio.
texts.en:
Migdalia, 45, is a merchant.  She sells food like chicken, meat and enchiladas.  She’s been in this business for 18 years.  Every afternoon she sets up her little plastic table, her clean tablecloths and chairs and her stove and starts placing her dishes hoping for her customers’ arrival.  Her food stand has gradually become better known and has become very sought after because of the flavor and aroma of her home-cooked meals; people who come by daily have been enjoying it very much.

She will use the loan to buy chicken, meat and bananas which are the raw materials she uses to prepare her delicious dishes.  One of her near goals is to buy a stove and to improve the appearance and comfort of her food stand to provide better customer service.  She is a woman who likes to make progress, and to be dynamic and active in her business.

loans.use: to buy chicken, meat and bananas.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia, de 29 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de Celso, su esposo desde hace 11 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Flor y Yefferson a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Santa Rosa. Ella es una mujer trabajadora, pues siempre para ocupada. Sus días comienzan con el cuidado de sus sembríos de maíz, cebada y habas, los cuales cosecha para luego vender a los comerciantes que llegan a sus mismos terrenos agrícolas. Por las noches, realiza un pequeño espacio para guardar a las ovejas a su rebaño, las que engríe mucho, ya que es donde obtiene un ingreso diario, con la venta de los animales maduros. Además de seguir trabajando por las noches con el ordeño de vacas, que realiza en una hacienda donde trabaja. Esta actividad la aprendió de sus esposo, quien trabaja en la hacienda más grande de su localidad, ordeñando a las vacas que posee, ahí recibe un sueldo mensual considerable que le ayuda mucho en los gastos del hogar. Por ello se siente muy contenta de tener a su lado al aliado para poder concretar sus objetivos. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Julia de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para sus sembríos y en completar el dinero para construir su casa en el terreno que posee.
texts.en:
Julia is an unpretentious woman. She has been living with her husband, Celso, for 11 years. They have 2 children together, Flor and Yefferson and they care for them in their own house located in the town of Santa Rosa. She is a working woman, well, she is always busy. Her days begin caring for her corn fields, barley and beans, which during harvest season she sells to the merchants who come to her own farmland. During the evenings, she makes a little time to watch over her flock of sheep, fattening them up a lot, as this is where she gets her daily income, with the sale of the grown animals.

Also she continues working through the evenings, milking the cows, which is done at the farmhouse where she works. This activity she learned from her husband, who works at the largest farmhouse in the area, milking the farmhouse cows and receiving a considerable monthly salary that helps them a lot with the household expenses.

She is very happy to have at her side an ally in order to be able to carry through her objectives. This is her fifth loan through MFP, where she feels very satisfied to be able to develop her normal business activities, having the help of all of you. Also, she promises to make her payments in a timely manner, as she has always been honest and hardworking. 

Julia upon receiving your support, will invest the money from the loan to buy natural fertilizers for her crops and with the rest of the money she will build a house on the land that she owns.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers and to buy materials to build her house

loans.name: Cesar Joaquin

texts.es: Cesar de 55 años de edad, de oficio comerciante es originario de Granada, casado, padre de 1 hijo de crianza el cual tiene a su cargo. El se dedica al negocio de pulpería desde hace 3 años actividad que inicio con capital que recibió por parte de una hermana de su esposa. Empezó  con créditos otorgados de otras instituciones financieras, anteriormente trabajaba como ayudante en el negocio de abarrote, el cuenta con otros ingresos ya que la esposa vende hamburguesas y frijoles cocidos contando con muy buena clientela en su mismo domicilio. Solicita el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de productos como carne, lácteos, productos de limpieza, galletas, pan, jugos, gaseosa. Esto le ayudara ya que podrá adquirir productos de mucha demanda departe de sus clientes y tendrá más ganancia, sus planes futuros son llegar a hacerle mejora a su casita para una mejor redistribución del negocio.
texts.en:
Cesar, 55, is a merchant.  He’s from Granada, married and is raising a child as if he were his own.  He has had a general store for three years that he started with capital he got from one of his wife’s sisters.  He started out with loans from other financial institutions.   He used to work as a helper in a grocery store.  He has other sources of income in that his wife works selling hamburgers and cooked beans at home and she has quite a good clientele. 

He’s asking for the loan to buy products like meat, dairy products, cleaning supplies, cookies, bread, juice and soft-drinks.  This will help him acquire products that have high customer demand and he will earn higher profits.  His future plan is to do some home improvements so that his business can be better situated.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock his store.

loans.name: Christine Njeri

texts.en:
Christine is 24 years old and married to Paul. Together they have three children. She operates a salon and has been in the business for the past two years.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a staff member. This is her first loan from KADET LTD. She will use the loan amount to purchase a stock of hair relaxers, weaves, and rollers for use in her business.

In the future, she hopes to venture into the real estate business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of hair relaxers, weaves, and rollers for use in her business.

loans.name: Rose Abau

texts.en:
Rose lives in Yei. She sells food from a food stall and has been in business for five years. She is 30 years old, married, and has two children, both of whom are still in school.

Rose heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase beans and rice. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans and rice to sell.

loans.name: Maria Deyanira Gallego Jimenez

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer ofrecer una buena calidad de vida a su familia. Debido a que su esposo murió y la ha dejado encargada del cuidado de sus hijos, Maria se ha visto en la obligación de encontrar un negocio con el cual pueda generar ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar, y fue así como inició su negocio de cría y venta de pollos, los cuales cuida en un galpón que construyó en la parte trasera de su casa. Gracias a la buena calidad de estos animales, Maria ha generado una muy buena reputación de su negocio en el sector, lo que le ha garantizado muy buenos clientes que se traduce en unas muy buenas ventas, hasta el punto en que a menudo la demanda por sus pollos es superior a la capacidad de producción que tiene en su galpón. Es por esto que Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a realizar adecuaciones en su galpón de pollos para ampliarlo y comprar más pollos para su negocio.

Maria espera que de esta manera sus ingresos mensuales aumenten considerablemente, pues ya podrá atender a todos los pedidos de sus clientes que antes no tenía la capacidad para responder. Además, Maria espera que con mayores ingresos sus hijos puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de progreso.
texts.en:
María is a person who has always been noted for being very hardworking and wanting to provide a good quality of life for her family always.  Because her husband died leaving her in charge of their children, María needed to find a business that would generate income to support her home and this is how she started to raise chickens to sell; she cares for them in a coop she built in her back yard.  

Thanks to the good quality of the animals, María has created a very good reputation for her business in the sector which has guaranteed good customers which means very good sales to the point that often demand for her chickens is greater than what her coop can produce.  Because of this, María is looking for a loan that will make it possible for her to make improvements to the chicken coop to enlarge it and to buy more chicks for her business.

María expects that her monthly income will increase considerably this way because she’ll be able to see to all her customer orders which she previously was unable to fulfill.  In addition, María hopes that with higher income her children will enjoy a better quality of life and greater opportunities for progress.

loans.use: to make some improvements to her chicken coop and to buy more chicks to raise.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en: Theresa lives in Airport and has three children between the ages of 10 and 20 years. For 15 years, Theresa has been selling palm oil in the local market. She learned how to sell from her mother. She likes how her business gives her money. She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil for her business. Her plan is to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for her business.

loans.name: Tumalu Noro

texts.en:
Tumalu lives in Yei. She has a food stall and has been in business for five years. She is 45 years old, married, and has five children; two of them are still in school. 

Tumalu heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase beans and rice. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans and rice for sale.

loans.name: Hasmik Aleksanyan

texts.en:
Hasmik is 38 years old. She lives in Ltsen village with her husband and two sons. Hasmik's one son is in the army at present. Hasmik's younger son and husband are involved with agriculture together with her. They cultivate land and breed cattle. The family has been running the farm for two years, through which they have created all necessary conditions for its further development. 

Hasmik would like to increase the number of cattle. She also needs investments to start land cultivation. With the help of this loan, Hasmik plans to purchase four cows, 700 kg. of potato seeds, and five bags of fertilizer. Hasmik will feed the cattle and sell the meat at the end of the year. She also expects a good harvest of potatoes. This will allow her to have a stable source of income during the year.

loans.use: to pay for cows, potato seeds, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Lavian Micheal

texts.en:
Lavian lives in Yei. She sells fish and has been in business for five years. She is 30 years old, married, and has three children; all of them are still in school. 

Lavian heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her fourth loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 2,000 Sudanese pounds in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Lilian John

texts.en:
Lilian is 39 years old. She is from Naivasha and is married with one child who is in school.

Lillian has a grocery business that she has been running for the past six years. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD, to enable her buy more bananas, tomatoes and onions to add to her stock.

She hopes to own a big grocery shop in the future.

loans.use: to buy bananas, tomatoes and onions for sale.

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en: Mohammed, 33, owns a salt store that's been in operation for about three years and is located in Taiz, Yemen, where he lives with his four children, ages 2 to 10 years old. With his sales, that are mainly to two important clients in the city, he's able to cover family and operational costs. He's currently applying for a loan of 100,000 Yemeni rials from AMB to buy salt to meet customers' demand. His goal for later on is to have a truck of his own to transport the salt materials but his working capital is insufficient at the moment to reach it.

loans.use: to buy salt for his business.

loans.name: Varditer Ghazaryan

texts.en:
Varditer is 53 years old. She lives in Noravan village with her husband, son and two daughters. The main source of income for the family is the farm, where they breed cattle and cultivate land. Varditer has been running the farm for 12 years. 
Varditer has applied for this loan to develop cattle breeding. With the requested amount she plans to purchase 2 cows and 10 sheep. Varditer expects to receive more income from the sales of meat and milk. This is vital for Varditer to improve her household conditions and create prosperous conditions for her children.

loans.use: to pay for 2 cows and 10 sheep

loans.name: Rufas

texts.en:
Rufas is a 30 years old business woman, who lives in Juba Yei. She is married and has 5 children between the ages of 17 and 1. 3 of them go to school. 

Rufas runs a Food store business, and she has been in the business for 2 years. She has No employee. Rufas heard about Finance Sudan through the fellow clients and outreach and promotion done by the loan officers. She is taking a loan of 1800 to purchase more items like Cooking oil, Sugar, Onions, Water and many others. In addition to this business Rufas has no other source of income.

In 5 years time, Rufas would like to hope for increment in the business size and also build for her a house. 

Her major challenges include Low income rate and change of the market to new location. 

Rufas says that, she is happy for finance Sudan’s support and it’s going to eradicate their poverty and make them able to pay their children in school.

loans.use: to purchase more items like Cooking oil, Sugar, Onions, Water and many others.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary lives in the Airport area, is 42 years old and has 8 children between 15 to 32 years old.  For the past 20 years she has sold rice, oil, candy and other items.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, candy and other items for her business, she plans to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, candy and others items for her business

loans.name: Lorena Del Carmen Intriago Solorzano

texts.es:
En la ciudadela San Cristóbal de la ciudad de Portoviejo conocido como La Ciudad De Los Reales Tamarindos, ciudad bella y hospitalaria, se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Damas De Progreso.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Lorena, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos, dos mayores de edad que estudian en Universidad y uno de 11 años que estudia en escuela. Su esposo es maestro cerrajero.

Ella como buena esposa y para ayudar a su esposo realiza el crédito para que él lo utilice en su trabajo, su esposo tiene un taller de cerrajería, allí realiza una gran variedad de trabajos con el metal, elabora puertas, ventanas sillas y estructuras metálicas, lleva 25 años con su negocio por lo cual es muy conocido y es la razón por lo cual nunca le falta trabajo, él trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 8h00 hasta las 17h00 con la ayuda de dos operarios a quienes les paga un sueldo semanal por su trabajo.
 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar hierro, soldaduras, pinturas y varios artículos para realizar su labor. Lleva tres ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la rapidez que salen los créditos.
 
Su sueño es tener su casa bien arreglada.
texts.en:
The members of the "Damas De Progreso" communal bank meet every two weeks in the San Cristóbal residential complex in the city of Portoviejo, known as the "City of the Royal Tamarinds," a lovely, hospitable city. 

This is where we met Lorena. She is 42, married, and has three children; two adult children who attend university, and an 11-year-old who also goes to school. Her husband is a master locksmith.

As a good wife, and to help her husband, she is undertaking a loan to use in his business. Her husband has a locksmith's shop, and there he does a great variety of metal work; he makes doors, windows, chairs and metal structures. 

He has been in his business for 25 years, so he is very well-known. That's why he never lacks work. He works from Monday to Saturday, from 8:00am to 5:00pm, with the help of two workers to whom he pays a weekly salary.
 
He is going to use this loan to buy steel, welding materials, paints and various several items to carry out their work. Lorena has been in the communal bank for three loan cycles, and likes it because the loans are processed quickly.
 
Her dream is to have a home in good repair.

loans.use: To buy steel, welding materials, paints, and other items.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
Rubén de 29 años de edad convive con Yolanda de 36 años de edad fruto de este amor tienen 2 hijos. Juntos  viven en su casa propia ubicado en la comunidad de corazón del valle del distrito de Pichari. Rubén dedicado a la agricultura, pues cultiva cacao y café en su parcela que está ubicado en las alturas de su pueblo. Aprendió a realizar éstos cultivos desde que era muy joven juntamente con sus padres y hermanos en la actualidad cada uno de ellos tomó su rumbo buscando su bienestar de su familia, mientras que Rubén como hijo menor se quedo al lado de su padre encargado de los terrenos agrícolas, con la finalidad de mantener y cosechar los frutos, para que pueda solventar los gastos de su familia y la de sus padres quienes ya no están dispuestos a realizar trabajos forzosos por la edad avanzada que tienen. Es así que Rubén trabaja cultivando día a día cacao con la finalidad de obtener mejores cosechas. Rubén está contento con esta labor que realiza, pues él más adelante esta pensando comprar un terreno agrícola con la finalidad de seguir expandiendo sus cultivos. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que Rubén se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas.
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles realizara el mantenimiento de su campo agrícola, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Rubén, 29, lives with Yolanda, 36, and they have two children.  They live together in their own house located in the community of Corazón del Valle in Pichari District.  

Rubén works in agriculture for he grows cocoa beans and coffee on his parcel located in the town’s highlands.  He learned how to work these crops while very young alongside his father and brothers.  

Currently, each one took his own path seeking their family’s wellbeing while Rubén, being the youngest, stayed alongside his father in charge of the fields so that he can care for and harvest the fruit in order to cover his family’s and his parents’ expenses who are no longer able to do the hard work due to their advanced age.  This is how Rubén works daily cultivating cocoa beans hoping to attain good harvests.  Rubén is happy with the work he does because later on he’s thinking about buying a parcel of farmland to continue expanding his crops.

This is his second MFP loan so Rubén commits to make his installment payments punctually.  He will use the 3000 new soles to provide crop maintenance and to do so will hire day laborers.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Esperanza Del Carmen

texts.es:
Esperanza, es habitante de la ciudad de Granada, viuda, sus hijos viven independientes pero ella esta criando a una nieta. Su actividad comercial la inicio hace 15 años cuando solo vendía  refrescos en su casa de habitación y también ofrecía a domicilio poco a poco. 
Después fue surtiendo su negocio con productos que sus clientes le pedían y pasado el tiempo se dio cuenta que hizo una mini pulpería. Ahora vende cosméticos y productos de plásticos y cartón tales como panas, picheles, vasos, cajas para empaques de comida pues su idea es ir surtiendo su pulpería de productos variados y que son de mucha necesidad para sus clientes. Ella realizo el crédito para comprar arroz, azúcar y aceite que son productos de los cuales buscan a diarios sus clientes y necesita tener inventario para vender. Su expectativa es seguir manteniendo su negocio estable y funcionando de manera rentable como hasta ahora ha venido trabajando por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Esperanza lives in the city of Granada.  She’s a widow and her children live independently but she’s raising a granddaughter.  Her commercial activity started 15 years ago when she only sold soft-drinks at home and sometimes home delivered.

Later on she started to stock her business with products her customers would request and as time passed she realized that she’d become a small grocery store.  Now, she sells cosmetics and plastic and cardboard items like baskets, pitchers, drinking glasses, food storage containers since her idea is to gradually stock the store with varied products that her customers need very much.

She took out the loan to buy rice, sugar and oil which are the products her customers look for daily and needs to have in stock to sell.  Her hope is to continue keeping her business table and functioning in a profitable way as she’s done so far for her family’s wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and oil.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, se dedica a uno de los oficios más pintorescos y coloniales propios de la zona de Granada como es ser cochero brinda servicio de transporte lleva 10 años dedicándose a esta actividad. Anteriormente era fotógrafo pero vio que dedicarse a realizar paseos a los turistas en coches era mucho más rentable. Al principio solo tenía 1 coche ahora tiene 4 coches tiene 2 personas que lo ayudan con este negocio. Además de hacer paseos con sus coches alrededor de la ciudad, también lo utiliza para eventos de desfiles de carrozas, para bodas y funerales, hace y decora las carrozas de acuerdo a la ocasión. 
El realizo el crédito para comprar materia prima tales como pintura, madera, tornillos, ruedas para terminar de construir un coche que tiene en proceso para trabajar. Pues sus planes es seguir siendo uno de los mejores cocheros de la ciudad de Granada brindar un buen servicio de calidad y presentación en su negocio y convertirlo un negocio prospero y rentable para mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia sobre todo ahora con estos tiempos tan difíciles.
texts.en:
Carlos works in one of the most picturesque, colonial occupations in Granada which is providing carriage rides; he’s been in business ten years.  He used to be a photographer but he saw that providing tourists with carriage rides was much more profitable. At first, he only had one carriage and now he has four plus two employees that help him with the business.  Besides doing the rides around town he also uses them for events like floats in parades, weddings and funerals; he decorates the carriages according to the occasion.

He took out the loan to buy raw materials like paint, lumber, screws and wheels to finish building a carriage that’s in progress to put it to work.  His plan is to continue being one of the best coachmen in the city of Granada and to provide a good, quality service with good appearance in his business turning it into a prosperous and profitable business to improve his family’s standard of living especially now during these very difficult times.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like paint, lumber, screws and wheels.
